name: Myrmex
condition_immunities: exhaustion, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone, unconscious

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 7 (1d8+3) piercing damage + 3 (1d6) poison.

actions.name: Earth Shift
actions.desc: Ranged Spell Attack: +5 to hit 60' 1 tgt in contact with ground. Target pushed up to 15 ft. in direction of myrmex's choice speed half til end of its next turn.

actions.name: Wall of Earth
actions.desc: Makes a wall of earth spring out of earth or rock on a point it can sense within 30' of it. Works like wall of stone spell except  can create only one 10 ft. Ã— 10 ft. panel with AC 13 and 15 hp.

bonus_actions.name: Earth Manipulation
bonus_actions.desc: Can manipulate and move earth within 30' of it that fits within a 5 ft. cube. This manipulation is limited only by its imagination but it often includes creating caricatures of creatures to tell stories of travels or etching symbols to denote dangerous caverns or similar markers for those in the colony. It can also choose to make the ground within 10 ft. of it difficult terrain or to make difficult terrain normal if the ground is earth or stone. Changes caused by Earth Manipulation are permanent.

special_abilities.name: Elemental Nature
special_abilities.desc: Doesn't require air food drink or sleep.

special_abilities.name: Limited Telepathy
special_abilities.desc: Magically transmit simple messages and images to any creature within 120' of it that can understand a language. This telepathy doesn't allow receiving creature to telepathically respond.

special_abilities.name: Stone Walk
special_abilities.desc: Difficult terrain composed of earth or stone doesn't cost the myrmex extra movement.
